title: QA-Gone? YEET THE RICH! 6.9.21
itunes:title: QA-Gone? YEET THE RICH! 6.9.21
description:
In episode 926, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Marcella Arguello to discuss QAnon, The Koch brothers being behind Joe Manchin's agenda, how the wealthy avoid taxes, a Blair Witch escape room, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. QAnon at a Crossroads: Leaders Try to Rein In the Crazy
  2. Joe Manchin is opposing big parts of Biden’s agenda as the Koch network pressures him
  3. The Secret IRS Files: Trove of Never-Before-Seen Records Reveal How the Wealthiest Avoid Income Tax
  4. Las Vegas Attraction ‘Escape Blair Witch’ Transports ‘Blair Witch’ Fans to Burkittsville, Maryland!
  5. LISTEN: 박혜진 Park Hye Jin - 'Y DON’T U (feat. Clams Casino & Take A Daytrip)' 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
